original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
8.18. Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: na āsavañca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ ceva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca eva na āsava vippayuttañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayutto ca na āsava vippayutto ca iva na no āsavaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no āsavaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no āsavañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavavippayuttañceva
analyzed: na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava vippayuttam ca iva

original: nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayutto ca na āsava vippayutto

original: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca iva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca ca iva na no āsavañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca
analyzed: na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca iva na āsava vippayuttañca

original: naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no

original: ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva
analyzed: ca āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca ca iva

original: nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: na no ca āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayutto ca na āsava vippayutto

original: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca iva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
